name: Vimeo full-width video player
description:
Full-width video player for Vimeo.

Intended for 5x4 and 4x3 (non-panoramic) displays, where lack of screen height is not an issue.
additional_info:
Mar 22, 2018 - changed description
Nov 12, 2017 - wrapper element class changed
Sep 8, 2017 - fixed no video (0 width)
Apr 2, 2017 - fixed broken full-screen mode
